unnormalised: The atmosphere at AIIMS Delhi was charged with anticipation this morning as Dr. Rajesh Kumar, HOD of Cardiology, prepared to lead a team in a groundbreaking surgery. Dr. Kumar, a renowned figure in the medical community, holding an MBBS, MD, and DM, has dedicated over 20 yrs to perfecting minimally invasive cardiac procedures. The news spread like wildfire amongst the hospital staff; everyone knew this procedure was different.
normalised: The atmosphere at A-I-I-M-S Delhi was charged with anticipation this morning as Doctor Rajesh Kumar, H-O-D of Cardiology, prepared to lead a team in a groundbreaking surgery. Doctor Kumar, a renowned figure in the medical community, holding an M-B-B-S, M-D, and D-M, has dedicated over twenty years to perfecting minimally invasive cardiac procedures. The news spread like wildfire amongst the hospital staff; everyone knew this procedure was different.

unnormalised: Alongside him stood Dr. Sunita Verma, a bright and upcoming resident doctor, eager to assist and absorb the expertise of Dr. Kumar. Dr. Verma, holding an MBBS, hoped to specialize in cardiology after her residency. The operation was scheduled to commence at 8:00 AM sharp. Mrs. Meena Iyer, the hospital superintendent, ensured that all necessary equipment and personnel were in place, checking everything with meticulous care. The superintendent, holding an MBA in Hospital Management, understood the importance of logistical perfection.
normalised: Alongside him stood Doctor Sunita Verma, a bright and upcoming resident doctor, eager to assist and absorb the expertise of Doctor Kumar. Doctor Verma, holding an M-B-B-S, hoped to specialize in cardiology after her residency. The operation was scheduled to commence at eight A-M sharp. Missus Meena Iyer, the hospital superintendent, ensured that all necessary equipment and personnel were in place, checking everything with meticulous care. The superintendent, holding an M-B-A in Hospital Management, understood the importance of logistical perfection.

unnormalised: Outside the operating theatre, anxious family members of the patient, Mr. Ashok Sharma, waited patiently. Mr. Sharma, diagnosed with a severe heart condition, had placed his trust entirely in the hands of Dr. Kumar and his team. The hospital chaplain, Panditji, offered prayers for a successful outcome. This was more than just a surgery; it was a leap of faith for everyone involved.
normalised: Outside the operating theatre, anxious family members of the patient, Mister Ashok Sharma, waited patiently. Mister Sharma, diagnosed with a severe heart condition, had placed his trust entirely in the hands of Doctor Kumar and his team. The hospital chaplain, Panditji, offered prayers for a successful outcome. This was more than just a surgery; it was a leap of faith for everyone involved.

unnormalised: The procedure, lasting approximately 6 hrs, proved to be a success. The medical bulletin released at 3:00 PM confirmed the operation had gone according to plan, and Mr. Sharma was in stable condition. Dr. Kumar and his team had once again demonstrated their skill and dedication to saving lives, reinforcing AIIMS Delhiâ€™s reputation as a leading healthcare institution.
normalised: The procedure, lasting approximately six hours, proved to be a success. The medical bulletin released at three P-M confirmed the operation had gone according to plan, and Mister Sharma was in stable condition. Doctor Kumar and his team had once again demonstrated their skill and dedication to saving lives, reinforcing A-I-I-M-S Delhi's reputation as a leading healthcare institution.

unnormalised: Celebrations erupted amongst the hospital staff as word spread. Mrs. Iyer expressed her gratitude to the entire team. Dr. Verma, overwhelmed with emotion, knew she had witnessed a medical marvel, and the future of cardiology in India looks brighter than ever, spearheaded by pioneers like Dr. Kumar.

Doctor Verma, overwhelmed with emotion, knew she had witnessed a medical marvel, and the future of cardiology in India looks brighter than ever, spearheaded by pioneers like Doctor Kumar.
